refnamediv.refpurpose: Generate a sample table using the padsynth algorithm.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Creates an ftable for use in an oscillator with values creared by the padsynth algorithm.

refsect1.title: DRAFT Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: f # time size "padsynth" fundamentalFrq partialBW partial_Scale harmonicStretch hampl1, hampl2, ...

refsect1.title: DRAFT Initialization
refsect1.para: size -- number of points in the table. Must be a power of 2 or power-of-2 plus 1 (see f statement).
fundamentalFrq -- fundamental frequency for the generated table.
partialBW -- bandwidth of each partial in cents.
partialScale -- ration that bandwidth inccreases with harmonic number.
harmonicStretchScale -- ratio of stretch of thre overtoes.
hamp1, hamp2, ... -- relative amplitudes of the partials
The table is filled with a sample that can be used in an oscillator
